Mercury::InputMessageHandler

virtual void handleMessage (const Address &source, UnpackedMessageHeader &header, BinaryIStream &data)=0
 This method is called by Mercury to deliver a message.

Detailed Description

This class declares an interface for receiving Mercury messages.

Classes that can handle general messages from Mercury needs to implement this.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

virtual Mercury::InputMessageHandler::~InputMessageHandler (  )  [inline, virtual]

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Mercury::InputMessageHandler::handleMessage ( const Address &  source,
UnpackedMessageHeader &  header,
BinaryIStream &  data 
) [pure virtual]

This method is called by Mercury to deliver a message.

Parameters:
source The address at which the message originated.
header This contains the message type, size, and flags.
data The actual message data.

Implemented in EntityMessageHandler.
